descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Dennis Schroder does it on both ends to get the Celtics within three points of the Hawks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Schroder steals and finishes with finger-roll layup) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Schroder steals and finishes with finger-roll layup

videos.description: Marcus Smart comes up with the steal and feeds Jayson Tatum with a sweet pass for the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Smart's behind-the-back pass sets up Tatum for dunk) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Smart's behind-the-back pass sets up Tatum for dunk

videos.description: Lou Williams keeps the play alive and hits Clint Capela inside with a perfect pass for the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lou Will feeds Clint Capela for the flush) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lou Will feeds Clint Capela for the flush

videos.description: The Hawks extend their lead against the Celtics after Trae Young's and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trae Young sinks the floater plus the foul) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae Young sinks the floater plus the foul

videos.description: Trae Young gets creative by passing through Al Horford's legs to feed John Collins for the layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trae Young shows off his vision with nice dish vs. Boston Celtics) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae feeds Collins with pass between Horford's legs

videos.description: Grant Williams gets the basket plus the foul

videos.headline: Grant Williams gets the basket plus the foul

videos.description: Cam Reddish fights off defender for and-1

videos.description: Trae Young drains bucket vs Boston Celtics

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trae Young drains bucket vs Boston Celtics) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trae beats 3 defenders and somehow makes the bucket in traffic

videos.description: Trae Young and Hawks produce a strong showing to beat the Celtics 110-99 at State Farm Arena.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Boston Celtics vs. Atlanta Hawks: Full Highlights) 2021/11/18 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Hawks handle Celtics to move to 6-1 at home
